long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Contact Michael Sheehan - Denver Criminal Defense Attorney

Easily connect with Michael Sheehan, a top Denver criminal defense attorney, using this simple and intuitive Chrome extension. Whether you need to search for specific legal information on his website or contact him directly, this extension provides a seamless experience.

Features:

Search the Site: Quickly find answers to your legal questions by searching the content on Michael Sheehan's website. The search functionality displays the top 3 relevant results with a brief snippet for easy browsing.

Contact Form: Reach out to Michael Sheehan directly through the contact form. Simply enter your name, email, and message, and the extension will generate an email to be sent to Michael.
Loading Indicator: A modern loading icon ensures you know when the search is in progress, providing a smooth and user-friendly experience.

How to Use:

Search: Click on the "Search" tab, enter your query, and hit the "Search" button. The extension will display the top 3 relevant results from the website.

Contact: Click on the "Contact" tab, fill in your details, and click "Send" to generate an email directly to Michael Sheehan.

Stay connected and informed with this convenient tool designed to help you navigate your legal concerns with ease.

Install now and have Michael Sheehan's expertise at your fingertips!
